Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.UI_CUBE

Class FactoryCUBE

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.Game.AbstractFactory
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.UI_CUBE.FactoryCUBE
public class FactoryCUBE extends AbstractFactory
Represents a factory for creating game entities in the CUBE game. Extends the AbstractFactory class.
Author:
Ahmad Shakleya
